# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: Write a script on the python that will click on the Pics of the site https://www.jvid.com/ 飄飄哥/album.
Screen it and take away the date and write the ascep

Відповідь: ag&photo title in file

import os 
from selenium import webdriver 

# Initialize Chrome Driver 
driver = webdriver.Chrome(executable_path=os.path.abspath("chromedriver")) 

# Access the page 
driver.get('https://www.jvid.com/飄飄哥/album') 

# Locate the photos 
photos = driver.find_elements_by_css_selector('img.photo') 

# Iterate through the photos 
for photo in photos: 
	title = photo.get_attribute('title') 
	date = photo.get_attribute('date') 
	
	# Write it to the file 
	file = open('photos.txt', 'a') 
	file.write(title + ", " + date + "\n") 
	file.close() 
	
# Close the driver 
driver.close()
